div.p: ANTONIO: So, Doctor, it's pretty straightforward.
DR. COLLIVER: Yes it is. The key thing you want to remember is anyone can develop heart disease. And our biology sets the trigger level.
ANTONIO: Just to review—if I have a lower trigger level that means I can develop heart disease more easily...
DR. COLLIVER: Yes. And the flip side—if I have a higher trigger level, then I have decreased risk of heart disease.
ANTONIO: But everyone has some level of risk?
